modName: Scarlet Dawn Color Variety Pack All Body Types
summary: Recolored variants of the original Scarlet Dawn Armor to add a greater selection of choices for the player or their companions.
descriptionHtml:
[b][font=Comic Sans MS][size=6]For the love of God please make sure you leave a comment if you have any issues or concerns, this is my first mod on the Nexus!!!
[/size][/font]
[size=3]D[/size][/b][size=3][b][u]escription[/u][/b]~[/size]

[size=2]Recolored variants of the original Scarlet Dawn Armor to add a greater selection of choices for the player or their companions. Each Armor- Shawl pair, comes with a unique name according to their color, similar to the Scarlet Dawn Armor's shade is of a red color, so are the names of the other armors. I know some, okay "most", have never even heard of the colors of some of the armors, but the more you know! I did not however, re-texture the boots or straps, just the armor and shawl, all of the textures are still their respective 4k and 2k textures.[/size]
[size=2] I didn't wan't to simply replace the armors with new textures that a person had to hassle to change, so I made textures for the armors and shawls, then gave them good names that reflected their colors. The TBD armor version still supports HDT just like themilkdrinker's conversion. [/size]

[size=3][b][u]The colors of the Armors and Shawls are[/u][/b][/size][size=2]~[/size]
[size=2]
[/size][list][*][size=2]Scarlet Dawn (Original)[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Fuschia Night[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Cerulean Evening[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Verdant Summer[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Hazel Dusk[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Palatinate Daybreak[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Glaucous Winter[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Dandelion Overture[/size][/*]
[/list][list][*][size=2]Persimmon Sunset[/size][/*]
[/list][list][*][size=2]Ebony Eclipse[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Cherry Nova[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Mythic Dawn[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Neptune Tide[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Ivory Star[/size][/*]
[/list][b][u][size=3]
Requirements[/size][/u][/b][size=2]~[/size]

[font=Comic Sans MS][size=6]Touched By Dibella  [/size][/font]
[font=Courier New]
1 XP32's skeleton animation [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/?]XPMS[/url] [needed to allow animation for all body replacers on the Nexus]
[size=2]2 themilkdrinker's [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53135/?]Touched By Dibella Body[/url][size=2] replacer[/size]
[size=2]3 urgarulga's [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53316/?]TBD Enhanced[/url][size=2] [optional but strongly recommended][/size]
[size=2]4 Ian Patterson's [/size][url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]SKSE[/url][size=2] [base mod to run SkyUI and a ton of other mods which most already have installed][/size]
[size=2]5 schlangster's [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3863/?]SkyUI[/url][size=2] [for HDT Physics Extensions and High Heel System and a ton of other mods too][/size]
[size=2]6 HydrogensaysHDT's [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?]HDT Physics Extension[/url][size=2] [you can choose HDT or not if you don't want the armor's jigglin' effect][/size]
[size=2]7 HydrogensaysHDT's [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36213/?]HDT HighHeel System[/url][size=2] [the armor mod needs it to function properly][/size]
[size=2]8 Jmenaru's [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50814/?]Scarlet Dawn Armor[/url][size=2] [just pick UNP][/size]
[size=2]9 themilkdrinker's [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55735/?]Scarlet Dawn Conversion[/url][size=2], choose HDT version or non HDT version if you didn't download it [download and overwrite Jmenaru's armor mod][/size]
10 Install my TBD replacer
[/font][size=2][font=Courier New]
[/font]
[/size][font=Comic Sans MS][size=6]7Base Cleavage BBP[/size][/font]
[font=Courier New]
1 XP32's skeleton animation [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/?]XPMS[/url] [needed to allow animation for all body replacers on the Nexus]
[size=2]2 Sevennity's [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36992/?]SevenBase Body Replacer[/url]
3 [/size]Ian Patterson's [url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]SKSE[/url] [base mod to run SkyUI and a ton of other mods which most already have installed]

[font=Courier New]1 XP32's skeleton animation [/font][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/?]XPMS[/url][font=Courier New] [needed to allow animation for all body replacers on the Nexus][/font]
[font=Courier New]2 Dimon99's [/font][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]UNP Body Replacer[/url]
[size=2]3 XP32's [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37900/?tab=1&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D37900%26preview%3D&pUp=1]UNPB Body Replacer[/url]
4 [/size][font=Courier New]Ian Patterson's [/font][url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]SKSE[/url][font=Courier New] [base mod to run SkyUI and a ton of other mods which most already have installed][/font]
[font=Courier New]5 schlangster's [/font][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3863/?]SkyUI[/url][font=Courier New] [for HDT Physics Extensions and High Heel System and a ton of other mods too][/font]
[size=2]6 [/size][font=Courier New]HydrogensaysHDT's [/font][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36213/?]HDT HighHeel System[/url][font=Courier New] [the armor mod needs it to function properly][/font]
[size=2]7 [/size][font=Courier New]Jmenaru's [/font][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50814/?]Scarlet Dawn Armor[/url][font=Courier New] choose UNPB-BBP version[/font][size=2]
8 Install my UNPB-BBP replacer[/size]


[font=Comic Sans MS][size=6][b][u][i]Bonus File
[/i][/u][/b][/size][/font][b][u]Essentially this is the file that holds all of the spare resources and crap textures left over from the project, not all are properly named, but I managed to name a few that would help some of you guys in case that you wanted the files without the change to your esm. Remember this is really a modder's resource for making more textures for this armor and even include my re-colored versions and the colorless armor and shawl textures.[/u][/b]


[font=Courier New]You can find the recipes for crafting the armors in the leather section. These textures are compatible with the other Scarlet Dawn Armor body mods made by Jmenaru. I will find a way to add them into an update, later.[/font]

[size=2]It seems like a lot for one to go through for this mod, but most likely the majority of people who are using the NMM and this body mod will already have most of the requirements, the requirements are meant to instruct others how to properly and cleanly install the mod from the vanilla standpoint.[/size]

[font=Arial][size=4]And to those who downloaded this mod for its textures and not leave a comment wanting only the textures.[/size][/font]
[youtube]95YdE89nTgI[/youtube]

[b][u][size=3]Credits[/size][/u][/b][size=2]~
[/size]
[size=2]All credits go to Jmenaru, themilkdrinker, urgarulga, Sevennity, Caliente, Nikitaa, Dimon99, Shockero, mamay1588, zzjay, refat, HydrogensaysHDT, and everyone else that helped towards this mod for the resources, textures, fixes, conversions, and input that was necessary to make this mod possible. Also thanks to AFK Mods for the [/size][url=http://afkmods.iguanadons.net/index.php?/topic/3895-skyrim-texture-sets/]texture sets tutorial[/url][size=2] and Nexus Wiki for additional [/size][url=http://wiki.tesnexus.com/index.php/Using_Texture_sets_for_Skyrim]texture set tutorials[/url][size=2].[/size]
